abstract.text: Automate the tasks you perform on the Apple Developer website and in App Store Connect.
A response that contains a single Apps resource.
The error details that an API returns in the response body whenever the API request isn’t successful.
Find and list apps in App Store Connect.
Get information about a specific app.
Find and list all available app encryption declarations.
Update app information, including bundle ID, primary locale, price schedule, and global availability.
